meanings: destruction, demolition, ruin, annihilation, 괴멸하다 destroy, demolish, ruin, annihilate

examples.korean: The rising river menaced the village with destruction. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 강물이 불어나서 마을이 괴멸될 위험에 직면했다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Spain's power decayed after her Armada was destroyed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 스페인은 무적함대가 괴멸된 후 세력이 쇠퇴했다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The enemy was annihilated by our troop's intense frontal attack. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아군의 집중 공세에 적군이 괴멸되었다 Neungyule

examples.korean: We drove the enemy to the brink of total defeat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 적군을 괴멸 일보 직전까지 몰아붙였다 Neungyule

examples.korean: Nuclear weapons are said to be devastating enough to wipe out our planet. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 핵무기는 지구를 괴멸시킬 만큼의 파괴력을 가졌다고 한다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
